item.title: Development: 2023 - January / February
item.content:encoded:
Upstream:

  • ğŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Local photos now show up in main Feed. Also showing sync state (local/remote/synced) in preparation of full photo sync
  • ğŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Choosing Camera folder if more than one folder exists inside DCIM folder
  • ğŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Allowing user to set max memory and disk caches up to their device maximums
  • ğŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Showing progress notification for full feed sync
  • ğŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Showing current/total progress in notification for jobs
  • ğŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Allowing user to cancel jobs from the notification from feed
  • ğŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Showing local media in the photo map
  • ğŸš€ LibrePhotos: It's now opt-in if you want your profile to be public (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Improve testing tool chain and added tests (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ UhuruPhotos: Camera media are prioritised when scanning local media so they appear faster in the UI and in the feed
  • âœ¨ UhuruPhotos: Showing both local and remote paths for media in Lightbox details
  • âœ¨ UhuruPhotos: Hiding the refresh day button on feed for days with only local media
  • âœ¨ UhuruPhotos: Opening app when tapping notification
  • âœ¨ UhuruPhotos: Showing local media status (permissions and sync) on the main
  • âœ¨ UhuruPhotos: Lightbox displays media sync status (synced/local/remote) when navigating
  • ğŸ”¨ UhuruPhotos: Fixing bug with precaching thumbnails constantly restarting
  • âœ¨ Translations: More Vietnamese, Spanish, Italian, Ukrainian, Norwegian, Russian, German translations by stnokott, Vistaus, cyrasafia , hsa00000, J. Lavoie, BMN, Atalanttore, RandomHacks-Git, IhorHordiichuk, Nerodacles, renemadeira, zlo2k, gallegonovato and many more
  • ğŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Expose only relevant data when using /api/user/
  • ğŸ”¨ Frontend: Searching for people works again (Implemented by Nerodacles)
  • ğŸ”¨ Mobile: Login does now work correctly with case-sensitive usernames
  • ğŸ”¨ UhuruPhotos: Fixed bug where local photo albums would have photos jump around showing up in wrong dates
  • ğŸ”¨ UhuruPhotos: There was still a bug with precaching which should now be fixed. (thanks @á“°á•µá•µá“ for spotting it)
  • ğŸ”¨ UhuruPhotos: Fixing notification icon
  • ğŸ”¨ UhuruPhotos: "Do Not Ask Again" button in Feed actually remembers preference

New Issues:

  • ğŸ’¡ Update people thumbnails ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/759))
  • ğŸ› Calculate Clip Embeddings Stuck ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/758))
  • ğŸ’¡ Run librephotos from URL subdirectory ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/757))
  • ğŸ› LibrePhotos keeps restarting and cannot access pages ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/755))
  • ğŸ’¡ Better People searching ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/754))
  • ğŸ’¡ Add deduplication ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/753))
  • ğŸ’¡ Multiple scan directory ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/751))
  • ğŸ’¡ Video library filter ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/750))
  • ğŸ’¡ Manually detect/outline faces ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/749))
  • ğŸ’¡ Manually add people to a photo ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/748))
  • ğŸ’¡ feature flag support ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/747))
  • ğŸ’¡ Import already tagged faces with 3rd party software ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/746))
  • ğŸ› Scanning faces broken: get() returned more than one Cluster -- it returned 2! ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/745))
  • ğŸ› ARM64/PyTorch Fatal Python error: Illegal instruction ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/744))
  • ğŸ› Librephotos search is very inaccurate ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/742))
  • ğŸ’¡ Prefill the demo website ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/741))
  • ğŸ› can't scan ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/738))
  • ğŸ’¡ Download image to local storage ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/737))
  • ğŸ’¡ Remove backed up images (Link)

If you are interested on how I develop this application, you can watch me develop features live on my channel

Sponsoring development:

My work is sponsored by 14 awesome people!

If you like the work I do, then you can support me via GitHub sponsors or via PayPal
